title: Font similar to Dalliance
content:
I have some descriptor type (a short sentence) under a logo and would like to use something a little feminine but not too  
"scripty". Something that has the character of Dalliance that is perhaps an italic font with a slight swash. Something  
contemporary female without being "fussy". A script without being a script. Any recommendations would be sincerely  
appreciated.

JC
author: J.C. Nunzamoto

comments.content: It would be helpful to see the logo or at least know what it looks like, what typefaces it might use.

[[http://www.linotype.com/915/kursivschrift-family.html?PHPSESSID=555ef1bebac7b6e80501408b9f56a43e|Kursivschrift]] shares some of Dalliance's characteristics. [Fling](http://web.archive.org/web/20100513074052/http:/www.linotype.com/434/fling-family.html) is another typeface in that same vein, though it might be a bit too "fussy".
